Texto: 
hiv (-)
chemotherapy and  radiation
• extensive abnormal enhancement of the sulci and subarachnoid spaces overlying the cerebral hemispheres and cerebellum
• extensive deep white matter changes
• mild hydrocephalus
secondary cns lymphoma, subarachnoid spread (carcinomatous meningitis)
• bacterial meningitis
• subarachnoid hemorrhage
• carcinomatous meningitis
64 year old man presents with altered mental status and lethargy.
this man had been treated previously, for an abdominal and thoracic diffuse large b cell lymphoma (dlbcl) , over the past 3 years.
